conversation.content: Hi, my Stratos Rewards account seems locked and I also need help changing a ticket today. Can you transfer me to someone who can handle both?
Hi and welcome to Celestar Air. I’m Nova, your virtual flight assistant. Thanks for calling! How can I help you today? I can arrange that transfer now.
Great—before I connect you, may I have your full name as it appears on your profile?
Thanks, Jordan. Could you please provide your phone number?
Got it—+1 415 555 2121. Could you please provide your email address?
Thank you. And just to confirm the reason: unlocking your Stratos Rewards account and changing an existing ticket today. Do you have your reservation or PNR handy for the change?

Perfect—Jordan Lee, phone +1 415 555 2121, email jordan.lee@mailbox.com, PNR Q7M4ZP. I’ll connect you with a Celestar Air specialist. One moment please. I’ll also stay on the line after the transfer to ensure everything is handled.
Transferring you now. If you need anything else afterward, we can add seats or bags to your itinerary as well.

mistakes.evidence: I can arrange that transfer now.
mistakes.incorrect guideline: Agent did not explicitly confirm intent and did not say: 'I’ll just need a few quick details before I connect you.'

mistakes.evidence: I’ll also stay on the line after the transfer to ensure everything is handled.
mistakes.incorrect guideline: Agent did not transfer once without looping; instead, they implied staying on the line after transfer rather than summarizing and cleanly handing off.
